titles.title: SBA Reaching all Communities Act of 2020
To require the Administrator of the Small Business Administration to provide resources and services to small business concerns in languages other than English, and for other purposes.
SBA Reaching all Communities Act of 2020

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

bill.summary:
SBA Reaching all Communities Act of 2020
This bill requires the Small Business Administration to provide resources and services to small businesses in the 10 most commonly spoken languages, other than English, in the United States. This shall include Mandarin, Cantonese, Japanese, and Korean.
